analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/3/0xe96f2c381e267a96c29bbb8ab05ab7d3527b45ab.sol:
	Contract SatoExchange has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/3/0xe96f2c381e267a96c29bbb8ab05ab7d3527b45ab.sol#263-264)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/3/0xe96f2c381e267a96c29bbb8ab05ab7d3527b45ab.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.18 (/unique_chucks/3/0xe96f2c381e267a96c29bbb8ab05ab7d3527b45ab.sol#1): it allows old versions
Parameter '_value' of SatoExchange.burn (/unique_chucks/3/0xe96f2c381e267a96c29bbb8ab05ab7d3527b45ab.sol#180) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_value' of SatoExchange.freeze (/unique_chucks/3/0xe96f2c381e267a96c29bbb8ab05ab7d3527b45ab.sol#189) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_value' of SatoExchange.unfreeze (/unique_chucks/3/0xe96f2c381e267a96c29bbb8ab05ab7d3527b45ab.sol#198) is not in mixedCase
